attributes.title: 0/10 I had to buy 2 new phones.
attributes.review: I would like to warn all of my fellow trump supporters to NOT download this app! I downloaded it on my iPhone XR and then it started acting really weird and none of my other apps worked except for the trump app. I got a new phone and downloaded my apps as usual (including this one) and when I started to use the trump app again my second phone was also broken! The trump app hacks into your phone and steals all of your information to send it to the Russians!!! Be careful!
